input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle

Product keywords:
Unique, holiday themed die-casts of favorite cars characters!
Each has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket!
Choice of four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability
Perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite cars fan's basket!
Collect them all!

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle is the perfect addition to your collection! This unique holiday-themed die-cast vehicle comes with festive details and colors, as well as a unique Easter basket. Each vehicle comes with a unique Easter basket, so you can collect them all and create your own Easter egg hunt. Choose from four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen, or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability. With this die-cast vehicle, you can collect all your favorite Cars characters and create your own Easter-themed races. This die-cast vehicle is perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite Cars fan's basket.
input_text.Response B: Celebrate Easter with your favorite Disney/Pixar Cars characters! These die-cast vehicles have special details and colors that make them unique, and they come in unique Easter baskets. Choose from Easter Lightning McQueen, Easter Mater, Easter Ramone, or the Easter buggy. Collect them all! They make a great gift for any Cars fan, young or old.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
